CD.TITLE: '$60 to get yelled at': Why officiating is nearing a breaking point
CD.DESCRIPTION: I really think technology has done more bad than good at all levels." The world has changed, and it has affected referees from pro to youth sports

CD.TITLE: Brady throws to suspended Gordon in workout
CD.DESCRIPTION: Patriots quarterback Tom Brady posted a GIF on his Instagram account of him throwing to suspended wide receiver Josh Gordon during a workout, which a source told ESPN's Mike Reiss was Tuesday.

CD.TITLE: McCoy unhappy Bucs quickly gave Suh his No. 93
CD.DESCRIPTION: Gerald McCoy feels disrespected that the Buccaneers gave away his old No. 93 so quickly and didn't communicate with him before his release.
